R0 internal

Calculate R0

R0_internal(delta, tau, phi, alpha, dH, dE, dP, RR_cysticercosis, theta, eta,
  chi, pih, pil, HPS, ...)

Arguments

delta
Egg production rate (per month)
tau
Egg to pig transmission paramter
phi
Proportion of infected pigs with low-intensity cyst burden
alpha
Human recovery rate from Taenisasis (per month)
dH
Human mortality rate (per month)
dE
The egg mortlality/removal rate (per month)
dP
Pig mortality rate (per month)
RR_cysticercosis
Risk multiplier for Cysticercosis if human has Taeniasis
theta
Egg to human transmission paramter
eta
Human recovery rate from Cysticercosis (oer month)
chi
rate of aquiring a pork meal (per month)
pih
High intensity infected pig -> human contact rate (per month)
pil
Low intensity infected pig -> human contact rate (per month)
HPS
Human population size

  • Arguments
